title: Teacher - English
key_responsibilities: Conduct demo classes as per the PlanetSpark content and methodology
Ensure an amazing demo experience for the child and parent
Conduct regular classes (post enrolment) using an in-house curriculum
Ensure timely feedback to the child
Adhere to the schedule for the demo as well as regular classes
behavioral_attributes: Excellent attention to detail, strong communication skills both written and verbal
Ability to build strong relationships with the child/ learner and make the class fun-based learning
eligibility_criteria: Excellent verbal and written communication
Willing to work 6 days a week (should be available on Saturdays & Sundays)
Willing to invest 3-4 teaching hours every day
At least 1 year of English teaching experience (freshers from BA English and MA English are eligible)
Should have good Wi-Fi and a laptop with a webcam
who_can_apply: Candidates with minimum 1 years of experience
mission: Build the next generation of confident speakers and creative writers

title: Online Tutor - English
key_responsibilities: Deliver online classes using EduBridge's curriculum
Create a positive and engaging learning environment
Provide feedback and assessments to students
Monitor student progress and adjust teaching methods accordingly
Collaborate with other educators and staff
behavioral_attributes: Ability to engage and motivate students
eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in English or Education
Strong internet connection and computer skills
Passion for teaching and student development
Availability for flexible working hours
Prior experience in online teaching preferred
who_can_apply: Candidates with a minimum of 2 years of experience
mission: Empower students through quality education and training

title: English Instructor
key_responsibilities: Plan and deliver engaging English lessons
Use interactive tools to enhance learning
Provide feedback and support to students
Track student progress and adapt teaching methods
Maintain professional and timely communication with students
behavioral_attributes: Ability to adapt to different learning styles
eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's or Master's degree in English
Minimum 3 years of teaching experience
Reliable internet connection and teaching equipment
Strong commitment to education
Experience with online teaching platforms preferred
benefits: Opportunity to work with international students
who_can_apply: Candidates with a minimum of 3 years of experience
mission: Deliver personalized tutoring services to students worldwide

title: ESL Teacher
key_responsibilities: Teach English as a Second Language to students of various ages
Create engaging lesson plans
Evaluate student performance and provide constructive feedback
Use digital tools to enhance the learning experience
Maintain regular communication with students and parents
behavioral_attributes: Ability to inspire and motivate students
eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in English, Education, or related field
TEFL/TESOL certification
Minimum 1 year of teaching experience
Tech-savvy with experience in online teaching
Strong English proficiency
who_can_apply: Candidates with a minimum of 1 year of experience
mission: Provide high-quality ESL education to students globally

title: English Language Coach
key_responsibilities: Provide personalized English coaching sessions
Develop customized learning plans for each student
Offer feedback and strategies for improvement
Utilize technology to create an immersive learning experience
Monitor and report on student progress
behavioral_attributes: Ability to create engaging and interactive lessons
eligibility_criteria: Degree in English, Linguistics, or related field
Experience with online teaching platforms
Minimum 2 years of teaching experience
Strong command of English language
High-speed internet and teaching equipment
who_can_apply: Candidates with a minimum of 2 years of experience
